title: Ethiopia's Tigray conflict: The beauty queen who risked her life to reach the UK
description: Selamawit Teklay fled conflict in Ethiopia, but advises others not to risk crossing the English Channel.

title: Ukraine War: The Donbas body collector who has lost count
description: For those on the front line of Russia's war in Ukraine, the personal toll is unbearable.

title: UK heatwave: The unusual things happening because of the heat
description: The Met Office has issued a red weather alert for extreme heat while temperatures could reach new highs.

title: Farnborough Airshow: Aerospace deals set to fly
description: Airbus and Boeing go head to head for deals as sustainability takes centre stage, while defence firms focus on the Ukraine effect.

title: Woman had smear test every day to help its discovery
description: The love story behind the invention of the Pap smear test.

title: TikTok Trucker Tim inspiring new lorry drivers
description: A lorry driver says his TikTok videos have prompted lots of viewers to start training to do the job.

title: How did a captain survive? - The mysterious death of 21 men on a Spanish fishing boat
description: Only three people survived, including the captain and his nephew, when a Galician fishing boat sank.

title: Denmark 0-1 Spain: Late winner sees Spain set up quarter-final with England
description: Spain set up a quarter-final with England in the European Women's Championship as a late victory over Denmark is enough to see them progress from the group stage.

title: Finland 0-3 Germany: Eight-time European champions impress again at Euro 2022 with dominant win
description: Eight-time European champions Germany end their Euro 2022 Group B campaign in style with a dominant win over Finland at Stadium MK.

title: UK weather: How to keep pets cool in hot weather
description: From dogs and cats, to fish and lizards, we've been getting some advice on looking after your pets during the hot and sunny weather.

title: Australia 17-21 England: Tourists seal series win over Australia
description: Freddie Steward and Marcus Smith's tries, either side of half-time, help England see off a stubborn Australia in Sydney and secure a 2-1 series win.

title: UK heatwave: Stay safe to avoid excess deaths in hot weather - health boss
description: Everybody's health can be affected as temperatures are set to hit 40C, the UK Health Security Agency says.

title: T20 Blast: Jordan Thompson hits 50 from 17 balls for Yorkshire
description: Yorkshire's Jordan Thompson hits 50 from 17 balls in the T20 Blast semi-final against rivals Lancashire at Edgbaston.

title: Missile strike on Ukraine space plant in Dnipro kills three
description: Russian cruise missiles hit a space rocket plant in Dnipro and the city of Nikopol is also hit.

title: Tory leadership rivals trade blows over tax and spending
description: The economy loomed large as the five contenders took part in the contest's first live TV debate.

title: Saudi Arabia: The significance of Biden's fist bump with crown prince
description: A photograph of Joe Biden and Mohammed bin Salman fist-bumping has gone viral - will their meeting be remembered for more?

title: New Zealand 22-32 Ireland: Sensational visitors claim remarkable 2-1 series win
description: Ireland hold off a ferocious All Blacks fightback to claim a sensational, unprecedented 2-1 series win in New Zealand.

title: Tory leadership race: Stakes high as debate exposes rifts
description: The TV debate between rivals for the Tory leadership is showing up divisions, the BBC's Nick Eardley explains.

title: Europe heatwave: Deadly wildfires spread in Mediterranean
description: A firefighting pilot dies in Portugal and a big fire spreads near Spain's Costa del Sol.

title: Cost of living: University students 'priced out' of graduation
description: A cap and gown, photos and extra tickets can cost £145, before factoring in hotels and travel.

title: World Athletics Championships: Laura Muir progresses as US great Allyson Felix bows out
description: Allyson Felix bows out from her career with one last medal as Laura Muir and Katie Snowden progress in the 1500m on day one of the World Championships.

title: The Papers: 'Meltdown' amid heat warning and Liz's 'tax boost'
description: Many of Saturday's papers lead on the extremely hot temperatures that are predicted for next week.

title: Mexican drugs lord Rafael Caro Quintero arrested
description: Rafael Caro Quintero is accused of torturing and murdering a US drug enforcement agent in 1985.

title: Euro 2022: Northern Ireland underdog story inspires young footballers
description: Young footballers in Northern Ireland say seeing their heroes on a big stage has been a game-changer.

title: Sri Lanka: Is a push for organic behind the country's unrest?
description: Social-media users are blaming the political crisis on "elitist green policies". What is the truth?

title: Ivana Trump died of blunt impact injuries to torso - NYC medical examiner
description: The death of Donald Trump's first wife is ruled accidental amid reports that she fell down stairs.
